trans-unit.source: Monitor dependencies, exceptions and execution times in Java web apps
trans-unit.target: Monitor dependencies, exceptions and execution times in Java web apps

trans-unit.source: Extended monitoring of your Java website with Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Extended monitoring of your Java website with Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Monitor dependencies, exceptions and execution times in Java web apps
trans-unit.target: Monitor dependencies, exceptions and execution times in Java web apps

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in Preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in Preview.

trans-unit.source: If you have [instrumented your Java web app with Application Insights][java], you can use the Java Agent to get deeper insights, without any code changes:
trans-unit.target: If you have [instrumented your Java web app with Application Insights][java], you can use the Java Agent to get deeper insights, without any code changes:

trans-unit.source: **Remote dependencies:** Data about calls that your application makes through a [JDBC](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/guides/jdbc/) driver, such as MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, or SQLite.
trans-unit.target: **Remote dependencies:** Data about calls that your application makes through a [JDBC](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/guides/jdbc/) driver, such as MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, or SQLite.

trans-unit.source: **Caught exceptions:** Data about exceptions that are handled by your code.
trans-unit.target: **Caught exceptions:** Data about exceptions that are handled by your code.

trans-unit.source: **Method execution time:** Data about the time it takes to execute specific methods.
trans-unit.target: **Method execution time:** Data about the time it takes to execute specific methods.

trans-unit.source: To use the Java agent, you install it on your server.
trans-unit.target: To use the Java agent, you install it on your server.

trans-unit.source: Your web apps must be instrumented with the [Application Insights Java SDK][java].
trans-unit.target: Your web apps must be instrumented with the [Application Insights Java SDK][java].

trans-unit.source: Install the Application Insights agent for Java
trans-unit.target: Install the Application Insights agent for Java

trans-unit.source: On the machine running your Java server, [download the agent](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=618633).
trans-unit.target: On the machine running your Java server, [download the agent](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=618633).

trans-unit.source: Edit the application server startup script, and add the following JVM:
trans-unit.target: Edit the application server startup script, and add the following JVM:

trans-unit.source: `javaagent:`*full path to the agent JAR file*
trans-unit.target: `javaagent:`*full path to the agent JAR file*

trans-unit.source: For example, in Tomcat on a Linux machine:
trans-unit.target: For example, in Tomcat on a Linux machine:

trans-unit.source: Restart your application server.
trans-unit.target: Restart your application server.

trans-unit.source: Configure the agent
trans-unit.target: Configure the agent

trans-unit.source: Create a file named `AI-Agent.xml` and place it in the same folder as the agent JAR file.
trans-unit.target: Create a file named `AI-Agent.xml` and place it in the same folder as the agent JAR file.

trans-unit.source: Set the content of the xml file.
trans-unit.target: Set the content of the xml file.

trans-unit.source: Edit the following example to include or omit the features you want.
trans-unit.target: Edit the following example to include or omit the features you want.

trans-unit.source: You have to enable reports exception and method timing for individual methods.
trans-unit.target: You have to enable reports exception and method timing for individual methods.

trans-unit.source: By default, `reportExecutionTime` is true, `reportCaughtExceptions` is false.
trans-unit.target: By default, `reportExecutionTime` is true, `reportCaughtExceptions` is false.

trans-unit.source: View the data
trans-unit.target: View the data

trans-unit.source: In the Application Insights resource, aggregated remote dependency and method exection times will appear [under the Performance tile][metrics].
trans-unit.target: In the Application Insights resource, aggregated remote dependency and method exection times will appear [under the Performance tile][metrics].

trans-unit.source: To search for individual instances of dependency, exception and method reports, open [Search][diagnostic].
trans-unit.target: To search for individual instances of dependency, exception and method reports, open [Search][diagnostic].

trans-unit.source: [Diagnosing dependency issues - learn more](app-insights-dependencies.md#diagnosis).
trans-unit.target: [Diagnosing dependency issues - learn more](app-insights-dependencies.md#diagnosis).

trans-unit.source: Questions?
trans-unit.target: Questions?

trans-unit.source: Problems?
trans-unit.target: Problems?

trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting Java

trans-unit.target: test
